name: Flying Moss
description:
This game took 3 years to make. A lot of effort was put into making this game. (but still there are some bugs) the game will be constantly improved, bugs fixed and made better. Click here to watch previews of this game. To help with the production of this game, Be sure to join our Discord. This game was going to be created in half an hour when it was scheduled to be created. but instead of being done in half an hour, it was done in half a week. I didn't think this game would develop this much. but the result is a great game

How to play

How to play it is written in the game. You can move with w, a, s, d or arrow arrow keys and shoot with mouse or space. (mode 1). In mode 2, you can move with the mouse and shoot with space. if you have unlocked new weapons, you can change weapons with tab. The game resets every turn. so resetting your items is not a bug
